hidden_dimensions.name: Seam Durability
hidden_dimensions.description: Users want to know if the leggings are constructed with durable seams that can withstand exercise and regular wear without bursting or tearing.

hidden_dimensions.name: Opacity
hidden_dimensions.description: Customers highly value leggings that are not see-through, especially during stretches or bends. They want assurance that the leggings provide full coverage and are suitable for various activities.

hidden_dimensions.name: Waistband Comfort & Support
hidden_dimensions.description: Users seek a comfortable waistband that stays in place, doesn't cut into the skin, and provides adequate support, particularly in the tummy area. They are interested in whether the waistband has elastic or is a yoga-style band.

hidden_dimensions.name: Fit and Flattering Appearance
hidden_dimensions.description: Users desire leggings that fit well and enhance their body shape, particularly the buttock area. They look for terms indicating a flattering fit that hugs curves in the right places.
example_vocabulary: makes your booty look so good

hidden_dimensions.name: Fabric Softness and Comfort
hidden_dimensions.description: Customers prioritize leggings made from soft and comfortable materials suitable for all-day wear, lounging, and various activities. They appreciate fabrics that feel good against the skin.

hidden_dimensions.name: Sizing Accuracy & Length
hidden_dimensions.description: Users are concerned with the accuracy of sizing, particularly length. Discrepancies can lead to disappointment, especially with 'one size fits all' claims. Maternity leggings require specific fit in the crotch area.
